bookingHero.subtitle: APPOINTMENTS & BOOKING SYSTEM
bookingHero.title: Transform Your Clinic Operations with Smart Booking
bookingHero.description: Designed specifically for clinics supporting automatic multi-queue flow for Diagnostics, Treatments, Pharmacy, and Payment. Streamline operations and improve customer satisfaction.

features.title: Online System
features.description: The online system helps maintain distance and prevent the spread of illnesses.

features.title: Clinic Multi-Queue Support
features.description: Automatic multi-queue flow designed for Diagnostics, Treatments, Pharmacy, and Payment processes

features.title: Save Staff Time
features.description: Automate appointment scheduling and queue management to reduce manual work and administrative burden

features.title: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: Intuitive design for both customers and staff ensuring easy adoption and efficient operations

features.title: Improve Customer Satisfaction
features.description: Reduce waiting times and provide better patient experience with organized queue management

features.title: 24/7 Online Booking
features.description: Customers can book appointments anytime, anywhere through web or mobile interface

features.title: Automated Reminders
features.description: Reduce no-shows with SMS, WhatsApp, and Email reminders sent automatically before appointments

features.title: Queue System Integration
features.description: Fully integrated with our professional queuing system for seamless patient flow management

howItWorks.title: Simple & Efficient Process
howItWorks.subtitle: HOW IT WORKS
howItWorks.description: Our booking system streamlines the entire appointment workflow from scheduling to confirmation
howItWorks.note: Get started today and experience the difference in your clinic operations

steps.title: Auto-Generate Schedules
steps.description: System automatically generates optimal appointment schedules based on clinic availability and staff capacity

steps.title: Online Booking
steps.description: Customers book appointments online through web or mobile interface at their convenience

steps.title: Staff Confirmation
steps.description: Staff review and confirm appointments, make adjustments if needed, and prepare for patient visits

steps.title: Automated Reminders
steps.description: System sends automated reminders via SMS, WhatsApp, and Email to reduce no-shows and improve attendance

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Queue Management
advancedFeatures.subtitle: POWERFUL CAPABILITIES

serviceSliders.title: Organize All Check-ins
serviceSliders.description: Manage and organize all checked-in customers in a centralized dashboard. Track patient status in real-time across Diagnostics, Treatments, Pharmacy, and Payment queues.

serviceSliders.title: Auto-Generate Service Order
serviceSliders.description: Automatically generate the optimal service order based on check-in time, appointment priority, and clinic workflow. Ensure fair and efficient patient flow throughout the facility.

serviceSliders.title: Real-Time Status Updates
serviceSliders.description: Provide real-time updates to patients on their queue position and estimated wait time. Keep everyone informed and reduce anxiety in the waiting area.

advancedFeatures.note: Contact our team to learn more about advanced features tailored to your clinic needs

bookingCustomers.title: Trusted by Leading Organizations
bookingCustomers.subtitle: OUR CUSTOMERS
bookingCustomers.description: We are proud to serve government departments, healthcare facilities, and service centers across Hong Kong

customerProjects.title: One of the worldâ€™s largest corporations

reviews.name: Dr. Anya Wong
reviews.title: Clinic Director
reviews.description: The booking system has transformed our clinic operations. We've reduced no-shows by 40% and our staff can focus more on patient care rather than administrative tasks.

reviews.name: Michael Chan
reviews.title: Operations Manager
reviews.description: Excellent integration with our existing queue management system. The automated reminders via WhatsApp have been particularly effective in improving appointment attendance.

reviews.name: Linda Lee
reviews.title: Healthcare Administrator
reviews.description: User-friendly interface for both patients and staff. The multi-queue flow for diagnostics, treatment, pharmacy, and payment has streamlined our entire workflow significantly.

bookingContact.title: Get Started Today
bookingContact.subtitle: CONTACT US
bookingContact.description: Ready to transform your clinic operations? Contact our team for a consultation and see how our booking system can work for you.
